meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>deceit</kanji>, so when you're doing deceit, you are going <vocabulary>to deceive</vocabulary> someone.
readingMnemonic: As a human everyone would know who you are. You can't deceive anyone like that. But, <reading>as a moo</reading> (あざむ)... a cow is what I mean... nobody would know who you are.
